pro2E.model

Class AntennaArrayFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro2E.model.AntennaArrayFunctions

  • public class AntennaArrayFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
     The AntennaArrayFunctions class contains a set of static methods to calculate various antenna array parameters.
    Author:
    pro2E - Team3

    • Field Summary

      static double T

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[][] circle(int n, double r)
      Calculates and returns an array containing n coordinates of points equally spaced on a circle with the given radius.
      static double frequency(double wavelength)
      Calculates and returns the frequency from a given wavelength.
      static double[][] grid(int nx, int ny, double dx, double dy)
      Calculates and returns an array containing (nx * ny) coordinates of points on a grid equally spaced with the given gaps dx and dy between the points.
      static double k(double wavelength)
      Calculates and returns the free space wave number.
      static double[][] linear(int nx, double dx)
      Calculates and returns an array containing nx coordinates of points on a line equally spaced with the given gap dx between the points.

      Calculates and returns an array containing the normalized absolute values of the complex array factor.

      Calculates and return the phase of a radiator in dependence of the radiators position, the rotation angle and the wavelength.

      Calculates and return the phase of a radiator in dependence of the radiators position, the rotation angle and the wavelength.

      Calculates and returns the complex element factor as a Complex object.

      Calculates and returns an array containing n coordinates of points equally spaced on a square with the given side length.
      static Complex[] sReflector(Radiator[] r, double wavelength, int radiatorType, double radiatorAng, double reflectorOffset, double startAng, double stopAng, int points)
      Calculates and returns the complex array factor as an array of Complex objects with the reflector enabled.
      static double timeDelay(double p, double period)
      Calculates and returns the time delay of a radiator in dependence of the phase and period.

      • s

        public static Complex[] s(Radiator[] r,
                          double wavelength,
                          int radiatorType,
                          double radiatorAng,
                          double startAng,
                          double stopAng,
                          int points)
         Calculates and returns the complex array factor as an array of Complex objects.
        Parameters:
        r - an array of Radiator objects
        wavelength -
        radiatorType - the radiator type
        radiatorAng - the angle of the radiator
        startAng - the start angle
        stopAng - the stop angle
        points - the amount of points to calculate the array factor at
        Returns:
        the complex array factor as an array of Complex objects

      • sReflector

        public static Complex[] sReflector(Radiator[] r,
                                   double wavelength,
                                   int radiatorType,
                                   double radiatorAng,
                                   double reflectorOffset,
                                   double startAng,
                                   double stopAng,
                                   int points)
         Calculates and returns the complex array factor as an array of Complex objects with the reflector enabled.
        Parameters:
        r - an array of Radiator object
        wavelength -
        radiatorType - the radiator type
        radiatorAng - the angle of the radiator
        reflectorOffset - the offset of the reflector
        startAng - the start angle
        stopAng - the stop angle
        points - the amount of points to calculate the array factor at
        Returns:
        the complex array factor as an array of Complex objects with the reflector enabled

      • norm

        public static double[] norm(double[] sAbs,
                            double sAbsMax)
         Calculates and returns an array containing the normalized absolute values of the complex array factor.
        Parameters:
        sAbs - an array containing the absolute values of the complex array factor
        sAbsMax - the maximum value of the absolute values of the complex array factor over the entire 360 degrees
        Returns:
        an array containing the normalized absolute values of the complex array factor

      • linear

        public static double[][] linear(int nx,
                                double dx)
         Calculates and returns an array containing nx coordinates of points on a line equally spaced with the given gap dx between the points.
 - nx must be greater than 0
 - dx must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        nx - the amount of points
        dx - the gap between the points
        Returns:
        an array with the coordinates of the calculated points

      • grid

        public static double[][] grid(int nx,
                              int ny,
                              double dx,
                              double dy)
         Calculates and returns an array containing (nx * ny) coordinates of points on a grid equally spaced with the given gaps dx and dy between the points.
 - nx, ny must be greater than 0
 - dx, dy must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        nx - the amount of points in the horizontal direction
        ny - the amount of points in the vertical direction
        dx - the gap between horizontal points
        dy - the gap between vertical points
        Returns:
        an array with the coordinates of the calculated points

      • circle

        public static double[][] circle(int n,
                                double r)
         Calculates and returns an array containing n coordinates of points equally spaced on a circle with the given radius.
 - n must be greater than 0
 - r must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        n - the amount of points
        r - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        an array with the coordinates of the calculated points

      • square

        public static double[][] square(int n,
                                double sideLength)
         Calculates and returns an array containing n coordinates of points equally spaced on a square with the given side length.
 - n must be equal to (k * 4), k E N
 - sideLength must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        n - the amount of points
        sideLength - the side length
        Returns:
        an array with the coordinates of the calculated points
